alert.note: Alert for Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 05 at 11:52AM CST until March 13 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi...Arkansas... Mississippi River at Tunica Mhoon Landing For the Lower Mississippi River...including Tiptonville, Caruthersville, Osceola, Memphis, Tunica Mhoon Landing, Helena... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY, MARCH 13... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Tunica Mhoon Landing. * WHEN...Until Sunday, March 13. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, In Mississippi, lots nearest Tunica Cutoff Lake in Lakeview are under water. South end of Mhoon Landing Park is beginning to flood. In Arkansas, roads from the levee to Buck Island are under water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Saturday the stage was 30.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM CST Saturday was 30.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 31.3 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
